name: Icarus Flying Academy
about: Icarus Flying Academy, based in New York, serves the tri-state area with a passion for aviation. Founded by two highly motivated enthusiasts, the academy offers comprehensive flight instruction using a fleet of meticulously maintained Piper aircraft, including the PA28-161 and PA28-181 models. With certified flight instructors, students learn the art of flight over breathtaking landscapes from Republic Airport in Farmingdale, NY. The academy is committed to providing a professional and supportive learning environment, ensuring each student achieves their flying goals. Whether you're a beginner or advancing your skills, Icarus Flying Academy is dedicated to helping you soar.
